attributes.action: Sebastian Coe and Boris Johnson must use the tube for all their daily travel for the duration of the olympics.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, insist that both Sebastian Coe and Boris Johnson use the tube for all their daily travel, every day, for the duration of the olympics.

Having utterly disregarded the impact this will have on ordinary Londoners who are not permitted to work flexible hours or work from home, or even attend any the events, yet still have the pleasure of paying for it all, as well as for the free travelcards being issued to every single ticketholder, we feel it is only fair that these fair representatives share our pain. I mean joy.
